name: Slow Cooker Ribs
author: Caselicious
summary: Super-simple recipe that will leave your mouth watering and your house smelling insanely delicious when you get home from work!
ingredients: 1 pinch steak seasoning, or to taste
1 pinch garlic salt, or to taste
1 pinch ground black pepper, or to taste
1 pinch chili powder, or to taste
1 (4 pound) package boneless country-style pork ribs
2 dashes hot pepper sauce, or to taste
directions: Mix the steak seasoning, garlic salt, black pepper, and chili powder in a small bowl
Rub the ribs all over with the seasoning mix, and place into the bottom of a slow cooker
Pour in barbecue sauce, Worcestershire sauce, soy sauce, teriyaki sauce, orange juice, and hot pepper sauce
Liquid should not cover the ribs all the way
Set the cooker to Low, and cook until ribs are tender, about 8 hours
